channel.title: Projects on A Potpourri of Data Science Topics for Analysts
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on A Potpourri of Data Science Topics for Analysts

item.description: Chocolate DB: App for chocolate I love chocolate. So I created a sqlite database of most chocolates that me and my husband ate (including a rating). Chocolate information can be requested via my chocolate-db api (built with fast api). I build a simple search interface with streamlit and hosted the app on digital ocean. Check it out here
